description.french: Vous avez obtenu tous les succès.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutti gli obiettivi.
description.japanese: 全ての実績を入手した
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado todos los logros.

displayName.japanese: ひとつのエンディング

description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu.
description.italian: Hai terminato il gioco.
description.japanese: エンディングを見た
description.spanish: Has terminado el juego.

description.french: Vous avez découvert le véritable dénouement du jeu.
description.italian: Hai scoperto il vero finale del gioco.
description.japanese: 真・エンディングを見た
description.spanish: Has descubierto el verdadero final.

description.french: Vous avez atteint Grymoire.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto Grymoire.
description.japanese: グリモワルについた
description.spanish: Has llegado a Grymoire.

description.french: Vous avez mis l'armée de Bahamut en déroute.
description.italian: Hai respinto l'esercito Bahamut.
description.japanese: バハムート軍を退けた
description.spanish: Has vencido al ejército de Bahamut.

description.english: Found the first key from the Crimson Prophecy.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé la première clef.
description.italian: Hai trovato la prima chiave della profezia cremisi.
description.japanese: 一つ目の鍵を手に入れた
description.spanish: Has encontrado la primera llave.

description.english: Found all of the keys from the Crimson Prophecy.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé toutes les clefs.
description.italian: Hai trovato tutte le chiavi della profezia cremisi.
description.japanese: 全ての鍵を手に入れた
description.spanish: Has encontrado todas las llaves.

description.english: Learned the location of Castle Exnine.
description.french: Vous avez localisé le château d'Exnovem.
description.italian: Hai scoperto la posizione del Castello Ex9.
description.japanese: エクスナインの居城をつきとめた
description.spanish: Has llegado al Castillo Exnueve.
description.tchinese: 查出超絕九垓城所在地

description.french: Vous avez capturé un myrage pour la première fois.
description.italian: Hai imprismato il primo miraggio.
description.japanese: 初めてミラージュをジェム化した
description.spanish: Has capturado tu primer mirage.
description.tchinese: 第一次將迷影獸化為寶石

displayName.japanese: ミラージュコレクター

description.english: Recorded a large number of Mirages in the Mirage Manual.
description.french: Vous avez ajouté quelques myrages à l'encyclopédie.
description.german: Mehrere Einträge in der Mirapedia freigeschaltet.
description.italian: Hai registrato un certo numero di miraggi nella miraggiopedia.
description.japanese: 多くのミラージュを図鑑に記録した
description.spanish: Has registrado bastantes mirages en la miragepedia.
description.tchinese: 將許多迷影獸記錄至圖鑑中

description.english: Recorded a huge number of Mirages in the Mirage Manual.
description.french: Vous avez ajouté beaucoup de myrages à l'encyclopédie.
description.german: Viele Einträge in der Mirapedia freigeschaltet.
description.italian: Hai registrato un numero ragguardevole di miraggi nella miraggiopedia.
description.japanese: 大量のミラージュを図鑑に記録した
description.spanish: Has registrado muchos mirages en la miragepedia.
description.tchinese: 將大量迷影獸記錄至圖鑑中

description.english: Recorded an inconceivable number of Mirages in the Mirage Manual.
description.french: Vous avez ajouté énormément de myrages à l'encyclopédie.
description.german: Sehr viele Einträge in der Mirapedia freigeschaltet.
description.italian: Hai registrato un numero astronomico di miraggi nella miraggiopedia.
description.japanese: 数えきれないほどのミラージュを図鑑に記録した
description.koreana: 셀 수 없을 만큼 많은 미라쥬를 도감에 기록했다
description.spanish: Has registrado un montón de mirages en la miragepedia.
description.tchinese: 將數不清的迷影獸記錄至圖鑑中

description.english: Recorded every last Mirage in the Mirage Manual.
description.french: Vous avez rempli l'encyclopédie.
description.italian: Hai registrato ogni singolo miraggio nella miraggiopedia.
description.japanese: 全てのミラージュを図鑑に記録した
description.spanish: Has registrado todos los mirages en la miragepedia.
description.tchinese: 將所有迷影獸記錄至圖鑑中

description.french: Vous avez obtenu un myrage maître.
description.italian: Hai completato il primo miraggiario.
description.japanese: 初めてミラージュボードをマスターした
description.spanish: Has completado tu primer tablero mirágico.
description.tchinese: 第一次精通迷影獸能力盤

displayName.japanese: 伝説のミラージュ使い

description.french: Vous avez obtenu 100 myrages maîtres.
description.italian: Hai completato 100 miraggiari.
description.japanese: ミラージュボードを100種マスターした
description.spanish: Has completado 100 tableros mirágicos.

description.french: Vous avez obtenu l'insigne d'un Sauveur.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto il primo emblema di un campione.
description.japanese: 初めてセイヴァーメダルを入手した
description.spanish: Has obtenido tu primer emblema de protector.
description.tchinese: 第一次取得守護者勳章

displayName.german: Der Stoff, aus dem Helden sind

description.french: Vous avez obtenu l'insigne de tous les Sauveurs.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto l'emblema di ogni singolo campione.
description.japanese: 全てのセイヴァーメダルを入手した
description.spanish: Has obtenido todos los emblemas de protector.

description.french: Vous avez participé à 100 combats.
description.italian: Hai combattuto 100 volte.
description.japanese: 100回戦闘をした
description.spanish: Has luchado en 100 combates.

description.french: Vous avez participé à 500 combats.
description.italian: Hai combattuto 500 volte.
description.japanese: 500回戦闘をした
description.spanish: Has luchado en 500 combates.

description.french: Vous avez ouvert 100 coffres au trésor.
description.italian: Hai aperto 100 forzieri.
description.japanese: 宝箱を100個開けた
description.spanish: Has abierto 100 cofres del tesoro.

description.french: Vous avez ouvert tous les coffres au trésor.
description.italian: Hai aperto ogni singolo forziere.
description.japanese: 宝箱を全て開けた
description.spanish: Has abierto todos los cofres del tesoro.

description.french: Vous avez vaincu un myrage dans une brèche sombre pour la première fois.
description.german: Eine Mirage in einer Finsterkluft besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il primo miraggio in una macabreccia.
description.japanese: 初めてダーククレバス内のミラージュを倒した
description.spanish: Has derrotado a tu primer mirage en una fisura lúgubre.
description.tchinese: 第一次打倒黑暗裂縫裡的迷影獸

description.french: Vous avez vaincu tous les myrages des brèches sombres.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto i miraggi in ogni singola macabreccia.
description.japanese: 全てのダーククレバス内のミラージュを倒した
description.spanish: Has derrotado a los mirages de todas las fisuras lúgubres.
description.tchinese: 打倒所有黑暗裂縫裡的迷影獸

description.english: Found the secret area in every dungeon.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé toutes les zones secrètes des donjons.
description.german: Alle versteckten Orte in allen Arealen gefunden.
description.italian: Hai trovato l'area segreta di ogni dungeon.
description.japanese: 全ダンジョンの隠れ家を見つけた
description.spanish: Has encontrado las zonas secretas de todas las mazmorras.
description.tchinese: 找出所有迷宮中的隱匿處

description.french: Vous êtes entré en contact avec une âme pour la première fois.
description.italian: Hai effettuato il primo intervento in uno scontro.
description.japanese: 初めてココロクエストをクリアした
description.spanish: Has completado un viaje astral.

description.french: Vous êtes entré en contact avec une âme 10 fois.
description.italian: Hai effettuato interventi in 10 scontri.
description.japanese: ココロクエストを10個クリアした
description.spanish: Has completado 10 viajes astrales.

description.french: Vous êtes entré en contact avec une âme 30 fois.
description.italian: Hai effettuato interventi in 30 scontri.
description.japanese: ココロクエストを30個クリアした
description.spanish: Has completado 30 viajes astrales.

displayName.german: Wächter der Träume, Realität und Zeit

description.french: Vous êtes entré en contact avec une âme autant de fois qu'il le fallait.
description.italian: Hai effettuato interventi in ogni singolo scontro.
description.japanese: ココロクエストを全てクリアした
description.spanish: Has completado todos los viajes astrales.

description.english: Fulfilled a townsperson’s request for the first time.
description.french: Vous avez aidé quelqu'un qui en avait besoin.
description.italian: Hai soddisfatto la richiesta di una persona in difficoltà.
description.japanese: 町の人の依頼を初めてクリアした
description.spanish: Has completado tu primer encargo.
description.tchinese: 第一次完成鎮民的委託

description.english: Fulfilled the requests of every last townsperson in need.
description.french: Vous avez aidé tous ceux qui en avaient besoin.
description.italian: Hai soddisfatto le richieste di tutte le persone in difficoltà.
description.japanese: 町の人達の依頼を全てクリアした
description.spanish: Has completado todos los encargos.

description.english: Joined forces with Shivalry to defeat the Golden Flan.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le flan doré avec l'aide de Shivalier.
description.german: Mit Shivalier gegen den Goldpudding zusammengeschlossen.
description.italian: Hai stretto alleanza con Shivalry per sconfiggere il budino dorato.
description.japanese: シーヴァと共にゴールデンプリンを倒した
description.spanish: Has luchado junto a Ultrashiva para derrotar al flan áureo.
description.tchinese: 和濕伯一起打倒金黃布丁

description.french: Vous avez puni Ifritah.
description.italian: Hai punito Ifrita, la fuggiasca.
description.japanese: ネブラから逃げ出したイフリータを倒した
description.spanish: Has castigado a Ifrita.
description.tchinese: 打倒從涅布拉逃出的伊弗利妲

description.english: Got to the bottom of the “phenomenon” at the Coliseum.
description.french: Vous avez résolu le mystère du Colisée.
description.italian: Hai sistemato la situazione nell'arena.
description.japanese: 闘技場の異変を解決した
description.spanish: Has resuelto el incidente del Coliseo.

description.french: Vous avez vaincu Orthros dans la bibliothèque des anciens.
description.german: Ultros in der Bibliothek der Urahnen besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Ultros a Bibliopoli.
description.japanese: 古代図書館でオルトロスを倒した
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Ultros en Villa Papiro.
description.tchinese: 在古代圖書館裡打倒歐特洛斯

description.english: Teamed up with Gilgamesh to stop the Bahamutian soldier.
description.french: Vous avez coopéré avec Gilgamesh pour éliminer les soldats de l'armée de Bahamut.
description.italian: Hai collaborato con Gilgamesh per fermare il soldato Bahamut.
description.japanese: ギルガメッシュと協力しバハムート軍兵士を倒した
description.spanish: Has luchado junto a Gilgamesh contra el soldado de Bahamut.
description.tchinese: 和吉爾伽美什合力打倒巴哈姆特軍士兵

displayName.french: Les Serviteurs de la Dyade maléfique

description.english: Brought all seven of the Pleiad back in line.
description.french: Vous avez repris le contrôle des Heptarques.
description.italian: Hai rimesso in riga le sette Pleiadi.
description.japanese: 七柱を再び従えた
description.spanish: Has capturado a los heptarcas.

description.french: Tamamohimé a rejoint votre équipe.
description.german: Tamamohime schließt sich der Gruppe an.
description.italian: Hai aggiunto Tamamohime alla squadra.
description.japanese: たまもひめを手に入れた
description.spanish: Has conseguido que Tamamohime se una a tu grupo.

displayName.french: Je ne supporte pas les hommes !

description.english: Defeated the Quacho Queen with one of Lann’s attacks.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu la reine des gorfous avec Lann.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto la regina dei quacchi con un attacco di Lann.
description.japanese: クイーンアチョをラァンの攻撃で倒した
description.spanish: Has derrotado a la pingüirreina con un ataque de Lann.
description.tchinese: 以朗恩的攻擊打倒亞秋女王

description.french: Vous avez vaincu la princesse zombie 10 fois.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto la principessa zombie 10 volte.
description.japanese: アンデッドセレブを10回倒した
description.spanish: Has derrotado a la princesa zombi 10 veces.

description.english: Defeated the Princess Goblin using the Warrior of Light's Champion Medal.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu la princesse gobeline avec l'insigne du Guerrier de la Lumière.
description.german: Die Goblinprinzessin mithilfe des Heldenemblems »Krieger des Lichts« besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto la principessa goblin usando l'emblema del Guerriero della luce.
description.japanese: ゴブリンプリンセスをセイヴァー召喚WOLで倒した
description.koreana: 고블린 프린세스를 WOL 챔피언 메달로 쓰러뜨렸다
description.spanish: Has derrotado a la princesa duende con el emblema del Guerrero de la Luz.
description.tchinese: 使用光之戰士的守護者勳章擊敗哥布林公主

description.french: Vous avez gagné un combat au Colisée.
description.italian: Hai vinto il primo scontro nell'arena.
description.japanese: 闘技場で初めて勝利した
description.spanish: Has superado tu primer reto en el Coliseo.
description.tchinese: 第一次在鬥技場中打贏

description.french: Vous avez gagné 30 combats différents au Colisée.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto 30 squadre nell'arena.
description.japanese: 闘技場で30チームに勝利した
description.spanish: Has superado 30 retos en el Coliseo.

description.english: Defeated every last opponent in the Coliseum.
description.french: Vous avez gagné tous les combats du Colisée.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto ogni singolo avversario nell'arena.
description.japanese: 闘技場で全ての敵に勝利した
description.spanish: Has superado todos los retos del Coliseo.
description.tchinese: 在鬥技場中打贏所有敵人

description.english: Braved and completed the new dungeons that appeared.
description.french: Vous avez terminé les donjons nouvellement apparus.
description.italian: Hai affrontato e completato i nuovi dungeon che si sono materializzati.
description.japanese: 新たに出現したダンジョンをクリアした
description.spanish: Has completado las nuevas mazmorras.
description.tchinese: 勇敢地通過新出現的迷宮

description.english: Defeated the Cogna known as XG.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le mêkha Xeno-G.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il cogniBot chiamato XG.
description.japanese: 魔震・XGを倒した
description.spanish: Has derrotado al Xenogear.

description.french: Vous avez vaincu plusieurs fois l'ennemi lors de la bataille désertique.
description.italian: Hai vinto molte volte in Agguato tra le dune.
description.japanese: 魔導アーマーで多くの敵を倒した
description.spanish: Has obtenido muchas victorias en Buscadaemonbots.
description.tchinese: 在沙海戰取得多次勝利

description.english: Cleared the sky of uncountable einhänders.
description.french: Vous avez détruit une quantité innombrable de einhänder.
description.german: Unzählig viele Einhänder vom Himmel geholt.
description.italian: Hai ripulito il cielo da innumerevoli einhänder.
description.japanese: 大量のアインハンダーを撃ち落した
description.spanish: Has despejado el cielo de einhänders.

description.english: Reached the final chamber of the Nether Nebula in record time.
description.french: Vous avez atteint le fond du Dédale de Nébra rapidement.
description.german: In kürzester Zeit die letzte Kammer der Nebula-Grotte erreicht.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto l'ultima grotta della Nebulosa Infima in un tempo record.
description.japanese: 短い時間でネブラの最奥に辿り着いた
description.spanish: Has llegado muy rápido a la última sala de la Caverna Nébula.
description.tchinese: 短時間內抵達涅布拉的最深處

description.english: Thwacked a whole bunch of cactuars in a single thrashing.
description.french: Vous avez donné une leçon à plusieurs pampas d'un coup.
description.german: Vielen Kaktoren auf einmal eine Lehre erteilt.
description.italian: Le hai suonate a un mucchio di kyactus tutti insieme.
description.japanese: サボテン達を一度にたくさんどついた
description.spanish: Has logrado golpear a muchos cactilios en la misma partida.
description.tchinese: 一回合打倒很多仙人掌
